sequence:
Shiranui, the Do-It-All Shopkeeper

<size=45>Chapter 7: The Shopkeeper's True Feelings (Pt 2)</size>

scripts.say: You'll understand if you think about it a little, Nyaa~
Whether it's Akashi's store or Shiranui's store, Commander still has to pay for everything out of pocket even though all the wares are supplied by the military, Nyaa.
However, these will all eventually turn into resources used to build up the fleet, Nyaa.
For Akashi and Shiranui, working at the store is also for the sake of helping out Commander! That's why Shiranui is capable of working so hard,Nyaa!
Loose lips sink ships, dumb cat.
And although she won't admit it, Shiranui is very happy to have been chosen for secretary, Nyaa!
So for her, she would never be able to give up one or the other, Nyaa~
Because both are for the sake of her beloved Commander, Nyaa!
This dumb cat seems to be itching for a beating today...
Nyaa~ ha ha, that's all Akashi has to say for today! Commander, the rest is up to you, nya!
The room suddenly fell into an awkward silence.
... Commander, you shouldn't dwell too much on what that dumb cat said. It's best if I handle things by myself.
I already told you, it's fine...

options.content: Promise that you'll definitely help out in the future

scripts.say: ... I'm only doing what I ought to be doing...
... ... ... ... ... *sigh* What an idiot. Whatever... do as you please...
It's because you do stuff like this... I couldn't help but to... ...
Shiranui, sitting atop the sickbed, let out a sigh. However, ever so faintly, the corners of her lips seemed to curl upwards.
Looking back, this was the first time I had ever seen her smile.
